casebody.data:
M. M. DOWNIE et al., Appellants v. Emory HORN et al., Appellees. No. 14050. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Jan. 9, 1953. Hayden C. Covington,. Brooklyn, N. Y., Toni S. Williams, San Antonio, Tex., for appellants. Dan Moody, Austin, Tex., C. S. Fletcher and Carroll F. Sullivant, Gainesville, Tex., for appellees.

Before HOLMES, RUSSELL, and STRUM, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
